Description: Rim and body sherd of Egyptian black ware pottery open vessel, probably a plate or fishplate; flat body with short downturned rim; groove around upper edge; dark reddish brown Nile silt fabric with mica inclusions; black slip on exterior and interior; inscription on top.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (IC.090)
